name: LocationButton.Title
desc: Constants that specify the text of button title.

items.name: static let currentLocation: LocationButton.Title
items.desc: A button title with the text Current Location.

items.name: static let shareCurrentLocation: LocationButton.Title
items.desc: A button title with the text Share Current Location.

items.name: static let shareMyCurrentLocation: LocationButton.Title
